pr_title: Added real name boolean option for the /list command

timeline.message: Added real name boolean option for the /list command

timeline.bodyText: Why did you delete a line randomly here?
timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText: Better: append this unconditionally, and only append the other part based on the condition.
timeline.author: pop4959

replies.bodyText: Oh also on second thought, you should also be using append instead of concatenation.
replies.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText: Please don't do this! I know the IDE will do this automatically, but you can turn it off. Wildcards are great in some cases, but I don't think this is one of them.
timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText: Every config option should have a description. What's clear to you may not be for others.
timeline.author: pop4959
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -381,6 +381,8 @@ list:
     # Uncomment the line below to simply list all players with no grouping
     #Players: '*'
 
+real-names-on-list: false

timeline.bodyText: Looks like you added extra space here for whatever reason
timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText: Might look cleaner if you chain append calls (this is common for StringBuilder; example: .append("a").append(b) -> "ab").
timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText:
I think this should still be clarified a bit more. Maybe something like:
"Displays real names in /list next to players who are using a nickname."
timeline.author: pop4959
